summary: This is an email from February 14, 2018, containing a meeting invitation for a weekly meeting between CID (likely Criminal Investigation Division) and AD (likely Assistant Director). It references a Skype connection on the 'high side', suggesting a secure or classified communication channel.

events.title: CID UC Weekly Meeting Invitation
events.description: A new meeting invitation is sent for a weekly meeting between CID and AD, with Skype information provided for a 'high side' (secure) connection.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated February 14, 2018, regarding a weekly meeting.
The meeting is between entities abbreviated as CID (likely Criminal Investigation Division) and AD (likely Assistant Director).
Communication for the meeting is specified to occur via Skype on the 'high side', indicating a secure or classified network.
